item.title: 英国央行称将黄金运往美国的热潮助长了对搬迁名额的争夺
item.description: 一位官员说，从伦敦向美国运送黄金以享受溢价的热潮正在助长对从英格兰银行金库提取金属的老虎机的强劲需求。【原文：The rush to ship gold from London to the US to take advantage of premium prices is fueling strong demand for slots to withdraw metal from the Bank of England’s vault, an official said.】

item.title: 立法者寻求禁止在美国政府设备上使用 DeepSeek 应用程序
item.description: 众议院情报委员会的两名议员计划于周四提出一项法案，禁止在美国政府配发的设备上使用 DeepSeek 的聊天机器人应用程序，理由是担心其代码与中国共产党有关。【原文：Two lawmakers on the House Intelligence Committee plan to introduce a bill Thursday to prohibit the use of DeepSeek’s chatbot application on US government-issued devices, citing concern its code is linked to the Chinese Communist Party.】

item.title: 海达尔的对冲基金飙升 16%，为客户带来过山车般的收益
item.description: 宏观交易员赛义德-海达尔（Said Haidar）带领他的对冲基金创下了 19 个月来的最大涨幅，为客户提供了一个喘息的机会，使他的策略摆脱了自二十多年前推出以来最糟糕的运行状态。【原文：Macro trader Said Haidar led his hedge fund to its biggest gain in 19 months, offering clients a respite from the worst-ever run for his strategy since its launch more than two decades ago.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行无视降息请求维持利率不变
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行在今年的首次会议上将基准利率维持在 35%，无视业界要求其采取宽松立场的请求。【原文：Zimbabwe’s central bank held its benchmark interest rate at 35% at its first meeting of the year, ignoring industry pleas for it to adopt an accommodative stance.】

item.title: KKR 称信贷是 "IPhone 时刻"，因为公共和私人市场正在融合
item.description: 随着企业寻找新的融资方式，资产类别之间的界限正变得前所未有的模糊。KKR & Co.表示，随着公共市场和私人市场的融合，正在发生的地震性转变将使 2025 年成为信贷的 "iPhone 时刻"。【原文：The lines between assets classes are being blurred like never before as corporations search for new ways to raise cash. With public and private markets converging, says KKR & Co., a seismic shift is happening that will make 2025 credit’s “iPhone moment.”】

item.title: 随着制造业加速发展，印度或将削减更多进口税
item.description: 印度财政部一位高级官员在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）访问美国之前表示，随着国内制造业的改善，印度将继续降低关税并逐步取消对进口商品的额外征税。【原文：India will continue to bring down tariffs and phase out additional levies on imports as domestic manufacturing improves, a top finance ministry official said, ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s visit to the US.】

item.title: 炼油厂停工导致欧洲石油市场价格疲软
item.description: 随着欧洲大陆的炼油厂开始停工进行定期维护，欧洲原油价格跌至几个月来的最低点。【原文：European crude prices have slumped to multimonth lows as the continent’s refineries start to take plants offline for regular maintenance, another cloud hanging over an oil market that’s largely wiped out its year-to-date gains.】

item.title: 受美国制裁影响，俄罗斯石油跌回 60 美元价格上限以下
item.description: 俄罗斯的旗舰原油自 12 月以来首次回落到每桶 60 美元的价格上限以下，这是美国对莫斯科实施新制裁可能产生影响的几个迹象之一。【原文：Russia’s flagship crude oil has dropped back below a price cap of $60 a barrel for the first time since December, one of several indicators that fresh US sanctions on Moscow may be biting.】

item.title: 每周日投注 10,000 美元
item.description:
走进五位忠实赌徒的球迷经历，他们说他们这样做既是为了友情，也是为了金钱。【原文：

Inside the fan experience of five dedicated gamblers, who say they do it for the camaraderie as much as the money.

】

item.title: 美国初请失业金人数回升，仍接近考前水平
item.description: 美国失业救济金初次申请人数上周有所回升，但仍相对低迷。【原文：Initial applications for US unemployment benefits picked up last week but remained relatively subdued.】

item.title: 美国生产力稳步提高，有助于限制劳动力成本
item.description: 美国第四季度的劳动生产率稳步提高，为本年度继续推动经济增长的更快效率提高画上了圆满的句号。【原文：US labor productivity advanced at a firm pace in the fourth quarter, capping another year of faster efficiency gains that continued to propel economic growth.】

item.title: 捷克因通胀放缓和增长乏力恢复降息
item.description: 捷克央行行长恢复降息，押注在经济增长疲软的情况下通胀将继续放缓。【原文：Czech central bankers resumed interest-rate cuts, betting that inflation will keep moderating amid sluggish economic growth.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "淘气清单 "可能将欧盟的汽车和机械置于关税范围之内
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的研究显示，如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对欧盟采取有针对性的举措，欧盟的汽车和工业机械有可能被美国征收关税。【原文：European Union cars and industrial machinery risk being subject to US tariffs if Donald Trump goes for a targeted push against the bloc, according to research by Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 日活跃用户数和预订量未达预期，Roblox 股价暴跌
item.description: 领先的视频游戏平台 Roblox 公司公布的本季度日活跃用户数低于分析师预期。该公司还下调了 2025 年的预订预期。【原文：Roblox Corp., a leading video-game platform, reported daily active users for the quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates. The company also lowered its bookings estimates for 2025.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）在竞争对手缩减可再生能源投资之际实现电力盈利
item.description:
这家法国大型企业增加清洁能源和燃气生产的战略正在取得成效。【原文：

The French major’s strategy of adding both clean sources and gas-fired production is paying off.

】

item.title: 埃克萨罗公司停职首席执行官曾瓦因受到指控而辞职
item.description: 南非煤炭生产商埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）被停职的首席执行官因处理对其行为指控的调查而辞职。【原文：The suspended chief executive officer of South African coal producer Exxaro Resources Ltd. resigned over the handling of a probe into allegations over her conduct.】

item.title: 芬兰拟立法禁止俄罗斯人购买房地产
item.description: 在与邻国俄罗斯有关联的房地产交易引发安全担忧之后，芬兰正在推进其阻止一些外国公民购买房产的计划。【原文：Finland is moving ahead with its plan to stop property purchases by some foreign nationals after security concerns surfaced over such deals with links to neighboring Russia.】

item.title: 美国市场最热债务悄然进入发展融资领域
item.description: 去年在美国资本市场掀起风暴的一种高风险债务，如今正以债券的形式出现，旨在为全球最贫困人口释放数千亿贷款。【原文：A type of risky debt that has taken US capital markets by storm in the past year is now emerging in bonds designed to unlock hundreds of billions in lending for the world’s poorest.】

item.title: 市场加大对英国央行宽松政策的押注，无视该行的鹰派言论
item.description: 在英国央行决策者如期将借贷成本下调四分之一个百分点后，交易商加大了对英国央行今年进一步降息的押注；其中两位决策者投票支持更大幅度的降息。【原文：Traders upped bets for further UK interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England this year after policymakers lowered borrowing costs by a quarter point as expected — with two policymakers voting for a bigger reduction.】

item.title: 在欧洲等待国防计划之际，硅谷向 "致命 "技术倾斜
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）问道，安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）对特朗普世界的追求对欧洲意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Mark Bergen asks what Andreessen Horowitz’s courtship of Trumpworld means for Europe.】

item.title: 为美国就业报告中的混乱做好准备
item.description: 我是纽约的经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们关注美国就业报告。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, an economics editor in New York. Today we’re looking at the US jobs report. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 北爱尔兰担心跨大西洋贸易战的影响
item.description: 北爱尔兰在脱欧后似乎获得了两全其美的结果：既能顺利地与英国开展贸易，又能顺利地与其前合作伙伴欧盟开展贸易。【原文：Northern Ireland emerged from Brexit seemingly with the best of both worlds — smooth access to trade with Britain as well as its ex-partner, the European Union.】

item.title: 英格兰银行发出鹰派警告，将利率降至 4.5%
item.description: 英国央行货币政策委员会投票决定将利率降至 19 个月以来的最低点，但发出了鹰派的信号，表示只需再降息两次，就能使通胀率回到 2% 的目标。【原文：The Bank of England’s Monetary Policy Committee voted to cut interest rates to a 19-month low but struck a hawkish tone by signaling that only two more reductions are needed to bring inflation back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂与特朗普首次会晤将谨慎行事
item.description: 日本首相石破茂在周五与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的首次会晤中可能会谨慎行事，因为他试图避免关税带来的经济影响，并重申日本与美国的安全联盟关系。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will likely proceed cautiously in his first meeting with President Donald Trump on Friday as he seeks to avoid economic fallout from tariffs and reaffirm his country’s security alliance with the US.】

item.title: 布雷万-霍华德公司中东地区首席执行官拉希尼据说将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）中东地区首席执行官 Oualid Lahsini 在任职两年后即将离职。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management’s chief executive officer in the Middle East, Oualid Lahsini, is leaving after two years in the role, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果特朗普发动贸易战，加拿大人支持以石油为武器
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，加拿大人在全国范围内强烈支持在必要时对石油运输征收出口税，以报复美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税。【原文：There is strong nationwide support among Canadians for putting export taxes on oil shipments if needed to retaliate against US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, a new poll suggests.】

item.title: 和平计划预期升温，乌克兰债券延续涨势
item.description: 乌克兰的美元债券连续第五天攀升，创下新高，因为人们对下周将出现终战协议细节的预期不断升温。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds climbed for a fifth day, hitting new highs amid rising expectations that details of a war-ending deal will emerge next week.】

item.title: DeepSeek 限制访问人工智能模型，因为需求使能力捉襟见肘
item.description: DeepSeek 是一家中国初创公司，其人工智能模型上周在全球市场掀起轩然大波，该公司表示，由于服务器容量不足，将限制用户访问其应用程序编程接口服务。【原文：DeepSeek, the Chinese startup whose artificial-intelligence model roiled global markets last week, said it would restrict access to its application programming interface service because of shortages with its server capacity.】

item.title: 华纳音乐公司以 4.5 亿美元收购布鲁诺-马尔斯和阿黛尔的歌曲
item.description: 华纳音乐集团收购了 Tempo Music 公司的控股权，该公司拥有布鲁诺-马尔斯（Bruno Mars）、阿黛尔（Adele）和维兹-卡利法（Wiz Khalifa）的歌曲版权目录。【原文：Warner Music Group has acquired a controlling stake in Tempo Music, the owner of a catalog of song rights spanning recordings by Bruno Mars, Adele and Wiz Khalifa.】

item.title: Vertical Aerospace 筹集 9000 万美元后将寻求更多资金
item.description: Vertical Aerospace Ltd. 计划在刚刚结束的一轮融资后筹集更多资金，这家英国初创公司的目标是在 2028 年之前对其电池供电的空中出租车进行认证。【原文：Vertical Aerospace Ltd. plans to raise more money following a just-concluded round, as the UK startup targets certification of its battery-powered air taxi by 2028.】
